import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Product.css' const Product = () => { const[sletectedImg,setSelectedImg]=useState(0); const images=[ "https://cdn.euromart.com/media/images/thumb/ba0547-boa-kalin-yuksek-taban-beyaz-siyah-bagcikli-spor-erkek-ayakkabi--332743-1-822420.jpg", "https://cdn.euromart.com/media/images/thumb/ba0547-boa-kalin-yuksek-taban-beyaz-siyah-bagcikli-spor-erkek-ayakkabi--332743-2-822421.jpg" ]; return (
setSelectedImg(0)} id='nimg'/> setSelectedImg(1)} id='nimg'/>
) } export default Product
